The Lord would have every man have a true, living experience that the representation may be of that character as is brought before us in 1 Corinthians 4:1-3: "Let a man so account of us, as of the ministers of Christ, and stewards of the mysteries 


                                     -325- 

of God. Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful. But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged of you, or of man's judgment: yea, I judge not mine own self." Can we say with Paul, "It is a very small thing"? [Verses 4-9, quoted.]
